attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe bringing back national service would help in putting a stop to teenage anti social behaviour, tenage pregnancy and general unruliness amongst tenagers. It would mean at the age of 16, all people unless they were going on to do higher education, would have to take part in a year of national service.  Whether it be as part of the armed forces or work within their local community.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Bring Back National Service."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11069.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/NationalService/
